document_name: Supporting Implementation of Bahrains Universal Periodic Report (UPR) Action Plan

outputs.output_descr: The project, which covers the year 2008-2012, focuses on the following areas: 1) strengthening Bahrain's human rights database and information system; 2) effective implementation of Bahrain's obligations under international human rights treaties; 3) strengthening Bahrain's capacities for applying a human rights based approach to development; 4) strengthening Bahrain's institutions for the protection and promotion of human rights; and 5) strengthening Bahrain's human rights normative framework.

The project, which covers the year 2008-2012, focuses on the following areas: 1) strengthening Bahrain's human rights database and information system; 2) effective implementation of Bahrain's obligations under international human rights treaties; 3) strengthening Bahrain's capacities for applying a human rights based approach to development; 4) strengthening Bahrain's institutions for the protection and promotion of human rights; and 5) strengthening Bahrain's human rights normative framework.

project_descr: Ministry of State for Foreign Affairs - Supporting Implementation of Bahrain's Universal Periodic Report (UPR) and  Action Plan
